name: consulta_estabelecimento
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Queries the CNPJ for unified information from Receita Federal, Simples Nacional, and Cadastro de Contribuintes.

cnpj.description: The CNPJ number to be queried.

maxage.description: Maximum age of the cached data in days. Defaults to 30.

simpleshistory.description: Whether to include historical data from Simples Nacional. Defaults to None.

registrations.description: UFs separated by commas to include information from Cadastro de Contribuintes. Use 'BR' to consider all. Defaults to 'BR'.

simples.description: Whether to include current data from Simples Nacional. Defaults to None.
